nodes.text: Celestials were beings known for their singing. Lando Calrissian once compared the singing voice of Naaruu to the sweetest of Celestials.

The name was introduced into canon with a mention in the 2018 comic Lando - Double or Nothing 2, though the Mortis Gods' Legends counterparts were said to be Celestials. The Celestials were first named by Troy Denning in his 2005 Legends novel Dark Nest I: The Joiner King, although the concept dates back to the likes of Lando Calrissian and the Mindharp of Sharu.
